MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH51 postcode area of Bo'ness. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:39am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional resources required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:19am on 3rd January
